content: yarn that is it s actually very easy to calculate - measure the yarn across the width of your row 4 times for each row you need to knit p1ko pass 1st knit st over used exclusively after knitting 3 sts grab - for 6 row thats a total of 24 times the width of your row the first of these 3 knit sts and pass it over the second and third sts just as if you were binding off rc right cross skip the first stitch on the left hand needle knit enjoying this pattern until november the second stitch leaving both stitches on the left hand 13th 2024 i m running a fundraiser for needle knit the first stitch and drop both stitches from the the loose ends project who matches left hand needle volunteer crafters like myself to families who have projects that are left behind sm slip the stitch marker uncompleted due to disability illness or loss of a loved one scan the code or st s stitch es click here to help raise money for this amazing organization yo yarn over t e x t u r e & t w i s t s h a w l instructions row 6 k5 sm purl to marker sm k5 cast on 3 sts row 7 k5 sm k2 yo k3 p1ko to 2 sts before marker k2 m1l sm k5 if you prefer working from charts please go to page 4 row 8 k5 sm purl to marker sm k5 row 9 k5 sm k1 yo k3 p1ko to 1 st before marker k1 m1l sm k5 section a row 10 k5 sm purl to marker sm k5 row 1 knit to end of row row 11 k5 sm knit to marker m1l sm k5 row 2 knit to end of row row 12 knit to end of row row 3 k2 m1l k1 4 sts row 13 k5 sm knit to marker m1l sm k5 row 4 knit to end of row row 14 knit to end of row row 5 k3 m1l k1 5 sts row 15 k5 sm knit to marker m1l sm k5 row 6 knit to end of row row 16 knit to end of row row 7 k4 m1l k1 6 sts row 17 k5 sm knit to marker m1l sm k5 row 8 knit to end of row row 18 k5 sm purl to marker sm k5 row 9 k5 m1l k1 7 sts row 19 k5 sm knit to marker m1l sm k5 row 10 knit to end of row row 20 knit to end of row row 11 k5 m1l k2 8 sts row 21 k5 sm knit to marker m1l sm k5 row 12 knit to end of row row 22 k5 sm purl to marker sm k5 row 13 k5 m1l k3 9 sts row 23 k5 sm k1 p1 rc p1 to 1 st before marker k1 m1l sm k5 row 14 knit
